title: Renaldo typeface?
content:
Hey guys - a client has come to me with a project that requires at font called Renaldo...I checked my usual sources and couldn’t find it, finally found it here:

[http://www.buyfonts.com/value\_for\_money/renaldo.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603172017/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/renaldo.htm "http://www.buyfonts.com/value\_for\_money/renaldo.htm")

Says it’s Windows only...anyone know of a really similar font for Mac?

Thanks!

 [‹ David Lynch's book "Catching the Big Fish"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603172017/http:/typophile.com/node/45992 "Go to previous forum topic") [HILLSIDE Furniture co and script fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080603172017/http:/typophile.com/node/45988 "Go to next forum topic")
author: macgee

comments.content:
For $2, plus VAT, I think you could buy a TrueType version and install it on a Mac. If it doesn’t work, you haven’t spent that much.

David
